definition: to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
to treat the symptoms but not the root cause
to recover spontaneously (from an illness)/to get better without medical treatment

sentences.english: Another 9-year old girl died after being admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 另外一名年僅9歲的小女孩在被送入醫院後不治。

sentences.english: I feel son on the so-called disease has also died and more of the basic.
sentences.chinese: 我自己感覺所謂的月子病也基本不治而愈了。

sentences.english: But such bond-buying is a temporary palliative.
sentences.chinese: 但這種債券買法治標不治本。

sentences.english: A few days later, the farmer's mother-in-law was killed when his mule kicked her.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，農夫的丈母孃被騾子踢到而傷重不治。

sentences.english: CJD usually kills within six months of the first symptoms a earing .
sentences.chinese: 瘋牛症患者通常在病發後六個月內不治。

sentences.english: Sciatica resolves on its own in three weeks in 75% of cases.
sentences.chinese: 75%的坐骨神經痛會在三週內不治而愈。

sentences.english: The new acupuncture treatment has opened up the forbidden zone of deaf-muteness and has cured many" incurable" diseases.
sentences.chinese: 新針療法打開了聾啞禁區，治癒了多種“不治之症”。

sentences.english: Scotch tape may solve the problem temporarily, but it cannot take the problem away.
sentences.chinese: 膠紙或許能暫時地解決問題，但是它治標不治本。

sentences.english: It was later reported Gaddafi had died from his injuries.
sentences.chinese: 稍後有報道稱卡扎菲傷重不治，已經死亡。

sentences.english: A bailout will not address the fundamental causes of Greece's fiscal problems.
sentences.chinese: 金援對於希臘的財政問題來說只是治標不治本。

sentences.english: Modern medicine can cure many diseases that used to kill many people.
sentences.chinese: 現代醫學已可以治癒許多不治之症。

sentences.english: There are no such things as incurables, there are only things for which man has not found a cure.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼不治之症，只有人類尚未找到療法的疾病。

sentences.english: “Caring is good, but it treats the symptoms without addressing the root cause of the problem,” says Ye Jingzhong.
sentences.chinese: 葉精忠說，“關愛是好的，但這治標不治本。”

sentences.english: The soldier died from a wound .
sentences.chinese: 士兵由於受傷不治而死。

sentences.english: Many of them succumbed to their injuries.
sentences.chinese: 他們之中的許多人受傷不治而死。

definition: to send or deliver to the hospital
unable to turn around a hopeless situation (idiom)/to fail to save the situation
sudden attack of a serious illness
to die (idiom)/to breathe one's last/to give up the ghost
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
